pages.title: Tin Ore
pages.text: Tin Ore can be found between Y:-10 and Y:70

pages.title: Lead Ore
pages.text: Lead Ore can be found between Y:-20 and Y:60

pages.title: Silver Ore
pages.text: Silver Ore can be found between Y:-54 and Y:40

pages.title: Platinum Ore
pages.text: Lead Ore can be found between Y:-64 and Y:40

pages.title: Lead Ore
pages.text: Lead Ore can be found between Y:-20 and Y:60

pages.title: Hellstone
pages.text: Hellstone is more common than Ancient Debris in the nether but can be only mined with Funghonite pickaxe

pages.title: Void Ore
pages.text: Void Ore can only be mined by Endrium Pickaxe
